panel.title: JMX - Thread Counts over Time Top 10

search.query: sourcetype=jmx host="*" jvmDescription="*" mbean_domain="java.lang" mbean_property_type="Threading"| bucket _time span=1m | stats max(thread_count) as currentThreads ,max(peak_thread_count) as peakThreads, max(daemon_thread_count) as daemonThreads first(threads_started) as threadsStarted earliest(current_user_time) as currentThreadUserTime earliest(current_cpu_time) as currentThreadCpuTime by _time host jvmDescription | timechart span=2m max(currentThreads) as "Current Threads" by jvmDescription where max in top10
